caption: Delicious! Just had the pork and chicken platter with family for lunch. Quality food and a very good reminder of the tastes of Greece.
Greek food ?? Yes here is ...
Order the lamb shank you won’t regret it - big portions and good price for the quality/size
excellent and tastefull greek tastes!!visit it as soon as possible.
Cozy place with the greatest pastitsio in the city
I’ve visited this restaurant several times and loved the experience each time. They have the best calamari there!
Delicious food and great service. Large, high quality portions for a good price. Have done takeout and dine in and would recommend both.

In a word - FANTASTIC! Freshly prepared, traditional Greek foods like my Yiayia used to make. We ordered the lamb chops, bifteki entree, chicken and lemon potatoes, and pastitsio.   It was all beautifully prepared and the portions were huge with a gorgeous salad too.  Highly recommend.  Added plus- the host that took the phone order was quite nice and polite.

Phenomenal food! I grew up in Bay Ridge and am half Greek so my family is always on the lookout for new spots. This is hands-down the best Greek food I've gotten from a restaurant in the area -- tastes just like home-style cooking! I highly recommend the zucchini cakes, leg of lamb, and cod fritters with skordalia. Rooting for the owners and their fantastic new restaurant.
An awesome Greek food addition to bay ridge! The food is simply amazing and Maria is super sweet. Can’t wait to come back and try everything on their menu!

I wanted to try this restaurant that had just recently opened near my home. Since restaurants are closed I ordered take out of Calamari  and spanakopita, which is a spinach pie. I am a huge fan of fried  calamari and this calamari was delicious. So fresh it almost  melted in my mouth. I had never had spanakopita before and I am so glad I got it. The flavors of this spinach pie were fantastic. The servings were so large i had leftovers. The next day when I reheated the calamarri it still tasted so fresh and good and I can still taste the wonderful flavor of the reheated spanakopita. I am so glad I tried Little Athens and I will definitely be back for more.

Absolutely Delicious! We ordered takeout a week ago. it was too delicious!!! we decided to go to this little gem to eat in before they close dine in on Monday. We met Maria , the chef/owner who in addition to cuisine is also a pastry chef. She shared her passion for food as a child and by NO surprise her dream is a REALITY! We started with the hummus and fried zucchini balls followed by the grilled branzino and lamb chops that were WOW!  Being a huge foodie, I highly suggest the fish and lamb chops and might stick to the traditional specialties which i saw being praised over by local greek patrons which if the greeks are eating Greek, YOU KNOW IT'S SPOT ON! Prices were VERY FAIR and the portions were suitable to share! i Can't wait to go back and until than, I will be ordering TAKE OUT! Thank you Maria for a wonderful meal! Your passion for food is praised! OPA!!!!!!

Have been there couple of times and  I LOVED it, the food there is really good and authentic.  The service there is really good, I love how nice the staff is and how welcome they make you feel! Highly Recommended<3 !

I was here today for lunch and I can’t wait to go back. I had a delicious salad with chicken. The chicken was fresh chicken off the bone. Owners are a brother and sister team and the sister is the chef who also bakes the desserts. What a gem of a place and I am so happy I live right around the corner. I just made plans to go back on Sunday! Please give this place a try, you will not be disappointed. The food is delicious and the owners are so nice.
Best Greek food in Bay Ridge
Came in for the brunch special for take out. The service was very fast and friendly. The side salad it came with is more like a whole salad. Very delicious, quick, and tasty and super affordable!
(Translated by Google) They are fabulous their exquisite dishes have to go and eat their dishes  (Original) Son fabulosos sus platos exquisitos tienen que ir y comer sus platos

This place just opened and we had a super delicious meal for a really good price. We got a spinach pie, branzino fish and the rib eye. The portions were large so there was plenty of food to take home as well. They are a family owned business and really friendly.  I could also see how well they were keeping up with the covid rules while I was there. I will definitely come back to support their new business!

I have to say this place is a real gem! Hands down the best authentic Greek place in Brooklyn! Since the restaurant recently opened, I’ve ordered almost everything in the menu and every time the food tastes so delicious & fresh - and delivery is super fast!  Not only is the food incredible, but the people who run this beautiful place, are truly amazing and the service is equally satisfying!!! LOVE everything they serve especially the Lamb Shank, Biftekia, Mousaka, Pastitsio, Salmon, Calamari, Octopus, Baklava and Loukoumades, etc.! ♥️ I definitely recommend this place to everyone!
Great food, it’s a must try, you won’t Regret it. Coming back soon!!!!!!

This place just opened and is truly spectacular. They make you feel very welcome as soon as you walk in the door. The portions are quite large and the food was ready faster than almost any restaurant I've been to. I chatted with the owners a bit who are from Athens so you know you are getting very authentic dishes. I had ordered the Spinich pie - spanakopita , and musaka which I had never heard of before because I usually think of Greek restaurants as mostly seafood dishes, but they have seafood dishes as well as other traditional dishes I haven't seen in many other Greek restaurants like the musaka which is like a casserole dish with eggplant and beef and all the yummy delicious things you can think of. The prices are also super affordable especially for the size of the meals.
